subject: Re: linux connection dying
body:
will do. thanks.
----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Jude DaShiell" 
To: 
Sent: Friday, May 04, 2007 6:49 PM
Subject: re: linux connection dying


> Your /etc/resolv.conf file may be messed up.  That's what caused my
> connection to die.  To fix it, I cleared out the resolv.conf file and just
> put one line of code in it search verizon.net which fixed the problem on
> the next connect attempt.
>
